provider.name: Robert Bosch Centre for Cyber Physical Systems, IISc

luxOutput.description: lux output of LED measured at LED

targetPowerState.description: If set to ON, turns ON the device. If OFF turns OFF the device. Writeable parameter. Writeable only allowed for authorized apps

targetBrightnessLevel.description: Number between 0 to 100 to indicate the percentage brightness level. Writeable only allowed for authorized apps

targetControlPolicy.description: Indicates which of the behaviours the device should implement. AUTO_TIMER is timer based, AUTO_LUX uses ambient light and MANUAL is controlled by app. Writeable only allowed for authorized apps

targetOnTime.description: Indicates time of day in seconds from 12 midnight when device turns ON in AUTO_TIMER. Writeable only allowed for authorized apps

targetOffTime.description: Indicates time of day in seconds from 12 midnight when device turns OFF in AUTO_TIMER. Writeable only allowed for authorized apps

targetOnLux.description: Indicates ambient lux when device turns ON in AUTO_LUX. Writeable only allowed for authorized apps

targetOffLux.description: Indicates ambient lux when device turns OFF in AUTO_LUX. Writeable only allowed for authorized apps

items.describes: Detects vehicle counts for various on-street IP Cameras. For a given time duration, it finds the counts per vehicle class for different directions(if applicable)

startTime.description: Start time ( in EPOCH, milli-seconds) for the corresponding time segment

endTime.description: End time ( in EPOCH, milli-seconds) for the corresponding time segment

direction.description: Directions for counts (For example, counts on bi-directional roads)
